Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a clean and efficient energy conversion device that can directly convert chemical energy to electricity.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: The state-of-the-art cermet anodes face various issues such as carbon deposition,sulfur poisoning and poor redox stabilities, which limit the application of SOFC.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: In order to avoid the problems of the cermet anodes, the perovskite anode materials with mixed electronic-ionic conductivities have drawn considerable attention in recent years.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: Among them, Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta a perovskite has good stability, high conductivity, suitable thermal expansion coefficient and excellent electrochemical performance, and thus has been widely studied, especially element doping.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: The element doping was discussed at A-site, B-site and O-site of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta a perovskite, and the effects of doping elements and doping content on crystal structure, stability, electronic conductivity, thermal expansion and electrochemical performance were summarized.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: These doping strategies provide some novel ideas for modifying Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta a perovskite anode, which can also be used to modify other similar perovskite anode materials.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: Finally, the development direction of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta a and typical ceramic anode materials was prospected.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: On one hand, the strategies of anion doping and co-doping could be adopted to improve the performance of ceramic anode materials.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials

Sentencas: On the other hand, the mechanism of element doping will be further clarified through the combination of doping strategy and theoretical calculation.
Titulo: Research progress in effect of element doping on electrochemical properties of Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ based anode materials
